name: EXECUTE ENRICH POLICY
shortDescription: Execute an enrich policy to create the enrich index
description: Execute an enrich policy to create or update the internal enrich index. This must be done before the policy can be used in an ingest pipeline, and should be repeated when source data changes.
notes: Must be executed after CREATE ENRICH POLICY before policy can be used
Creates a hidden system index for fast lookups
Execution may take time for large datasets
